translation.sobre2: Front End Developer focused on creating modern, scalable, and user-oriented web applications. I work with React, Next.js, JavaScript, and TypeScript, developing responsive, performant, and well-structured interfaces.
translation.sobre3: I have experience in integrations with REST APIs and support in back-end development using Java and SQL, in addition to working with solutions like Supabase for authentication and database. I also apply process automation and integrations using n8n.
translation.sobre4: I have experience in agile environments and a focus on quality, efficiency, and delivering solutions that generate business value.
translation.ditado: Try once, twice, three times and if possible try the fourth, fifth and as many times as necessary. Just don't give up on the first attempts, persistence is the friend of conquest. If you want to get where most don't, do what most don't.
translation.projeto1: Project inspired by SpaceX using HTML, Sass, and Bootstrap. HTML structures the content, Sass brings efficient and customized styling, and Bootstrap ensures a responsive and modern design. The site reflects SpaceX's innovation, with a clean and visually impactful interface.
translation.projeto2: Vexel Tech is a company specializing in the development of modern websites, landing pages, and digital solutions. Focused on high performance, conversion, and results, the project stands out for its clean design and optimized interfaces to provide the best user experience and boost businesses in the digital environment.
translation.projeto3: A stock manager project using HTML, CSS, React, and Vite, with storage in Google's cache. Users can easily add, remove, edit, and delete items. The interface is intuitive and fast, thanks to HTML, CSS, and React, with Vite speeding up development. Google's cache ensures secure storage without the need for a robust backend. This efficient solution allows real-time inventory management, providing an advanced digital tool for stock management.
translation.projeto4: GoFix is a multi-platform application developed with Flutter and Dart, designed to offer an efficient and intuitive solution for service scheduling and management. The project focuses on high performance and a fluid user interface, ensuring agility for both service providers and customers.
